page.title: 06HEALTH CARE SEAHOUSES
page.content: In Seahouses we are well looked after by medical people based at the Health Centre in James Street. There are two practices with eight doctors between them, one based in Belford and the other in Embleton. There is a District Nurse who is also a Midwife, but, almost all babies are born in hospital because we are a long way from help if anything goes wrong. Also based at the Health Centre are, an assistant nurse, a Health Visitor and assistant, a Physiotherapist, three Bathing Attendants, eight Home Helps and a Chiropodist. A Child Clinic is held once a fortnight, a Baby Clinic once a week and there are ante natal, parent craft and relaxation classes. A nurse is always on call 24 hours a day seven days a week.
